setup_script_description: sets focus on and expands the combobox, and sets the combobox value to 'a'
task: navigate from filled in expanded combobox to last option in listbox popup
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the combobox, navigate to the the last option in the listbox popup.
output_assertions: Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
Name of the popup ('States') is conveyed
Text of the focused option in the popup ('Arkansas') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (5) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (5) is conveyed
